mapper.select: select driver.id,driver.name,driver.product_code as productCode,driver.chip_code as chipCode, driver.engineer_id as engineerId, user.name as engineerName from driver,user where driver.name=#{name} and driver.engineer_id = user.id

select driver.id,driver.name,driver.product_code as productCode,driver.chip_code as chipCode, driver.engineer_id as engineerId, engineer.name as engineerName, product.customer_id as customerId, customer.name as customerName,newVersion.lastVersion from driver left join (select DRIVER_ID,max(version) as lastVersion from version group by DRIVER_ID) as newVersion on driver.ID = newVersion.DRIVER_ID,user as engineer,product,user as customer where driver.product_code=product.code and driver.engineer_id = engineer.id and product.customer_id = customer.id limit #{page.limit} offset #{page.offset}
mapper.update: update driver set product_code = #{productCode},chip_code = #{chipCode},engineer_id = #{engineerId} where name=#{name};
